Hello:

Thanks for this tutorial.  I can read and follow it better than the tutorial on the Django site.  The screen shots help quite a bit.  However, on the Django web  site and in this tutorial , we're asked to create a URLConf file called "urls.py".    But my reactions were the same each time, "...HOW?", And where in the instructions preceding this task is creating this file in  this directory, explained?".  I'm  thinking that this is a simple task to code, but somehow I missed it in both tutorials.  Could you point me in the right direction please?  Thanks.
Okay, this was as easy as I thought it'd be.  Created files in Jupiter IDE using iPy, but had to specify directories when writing views and so forth.  Used " . " while working in bash.
